dublin_core.dcvalue: The aim of this survey was to examine health care professional s attitudes towards technology involving support from artificial intelligence AI robots and humanoids Within 10 15 years every third student has to choose occupation within the health care sector to obtain the current personal level due to the aging population and retirement within the health service sector
Studies in health technology and informatics
Personals attitudes towards robot assisted health care - a pilot study in 111 respondents.
